ABOUT JUNIOR'S
Junior’s Entertainment Group
has provided amazing customized entertainment experiences for weddings, corporate events, and other social occasions in South Florida, nationally, and overseas for over two decades, consistently creating and reinventing its portfolio to offer the most unique entertainment experiences.
The Company will offer you the most suitable
options specially tailored for your event based on your music preferences, audience demographics, type of event, and venue space
.
Click here for Pricing and Availability
.
Junior’s has the Best and most
Amazing Live Bands Portfolio
to fulfill your music taste
which includes:
The Ice Breakers
(
Unique Vintage and Modern Sounds with a mix of NYC + Palm Beach + Miami Beach flair
)
,
The Super Hybrid
(
The NEW sound of South Florida with Synchronized Live Musicians + DJ performing LIVE hits
), and
Junior’s Band
(Global Recording Artists performing Top 40s and Retro hits in English and Spanish with Tropical hip Rhythms underneath a la Miami)
.
Alongside Junior’s outstanding
Bands
, there are other services such as
Ambiance Lighting
for a touch of warmth and elegance,
Strings Ensembles
(Wedding Ceremonies, Cocktails, Buffett, and Sit-down Dinners),
Jazz Ensembles
(Cocktails, Buffett, and Sit-down Dinners),
Internationally experienced DJ’s
with the largest music selection
,
Unique Themes
with a variety of Characters to enhance Bands and DJs performances,
Specialty Talent
with different styles for personalized music tastes,
Photo/Video
with its superb and talented Media Team,
Production
(
Staging
,
LED Dancefloors
and
Walls
,
LED DJ booths
,
Confetti Cannons
,
CO2 Cryo jets
,
Water-based haze effect
for stage and dancefloor, and
Fireworks
), and
Sound and Lights systems
for their Stage performances or any other clients’ needs.
Junior’s Bands
has performed for Private Events along
with many famous mainstream artists such as: Dua Lipa, Ed Sheeran, Camila Cabello, Post Malone, Bad Bunny, Shawn Mendes, Cardi B, Maluma, Shakira, Pitbull, Demi Lovato, Juan Luis Guerra, Jason Derulo, Carlos Vives, Gente de Zona, Earth Wind and Fire, The Weeknd, JBalvin, Ozuna, Marc Anthony, Pitbull, Shakira, Bruno Mars, Gran Combo de Puerto Rico, Oscar D’Leon, and Daddy Yankee among many others.
When you hire Junior’s,
instead of choosing among semi-professionals on a directory site, or talking to a salesman at an agency, you will work one-on-one with Junior and his Team—a dedicated life-long Music Business Company for Private Events who takes pride on leading the South Florida Industry for
more than 25 years
by constantly reinventing themselves.  The Team carries a vast experience with
more than 2000 successfully customized events locally, nationally, and internationally
like none other in the Event Industry.
The success of Junior’s Entertainment’s
endeavors is a testament to the Team’s musical expertise, organization, and its ability led by
Junior Antoniazzi
to constantly reinvent and create new trends for Private Events.  Junior’s has
Haute-couture Gowns for the Female Singers
and
Italian Velvet Tuxedo Jackets for the Gentlemen
to customize performances beyond the music.
Junior’s sets the bar
for event entertainment, and it is ready to take yours to the next level.  Yes,
Junior’s Entertainment travels Worldwide
upon request.
Ask for an instant quote
The Process
Ask for an instant quote
(click here)
with all information requested
to provide you availability and the Best Entertainment Options/Packages
After selecting your best options based upon your style and budget, you will receive an agreement and deposit payment instructions to reserve Junior’s services for your event date
Once the agreement/deposit payment process is completed, you will receive a Comprehensive Questionnaire for formalities (if any) and Demographic study, and a music selection guide for your choices
WHAT CLIENTS ARE SAYING!
Wow! Juniors Entertainment was the perfect fit for our 4/12/2025 wedding in Palm Beach, FL. From the ceremony with the Strings Ensembles and Singers, to the Jazz Band for the cocktail hour, and to The Ice Breakers Band for the Reception and DJ for the After-party - everything was perfect. My family and friends were amazed with all; the music Junior specially tailored for us. The Ceremony music was truly magical, and the Jazz vibe before the Reception set the pace for the party. The Ice Breakers had great enthusiasm and got the guests excited to dance on the dancefloor at all times. The Band Gowns and Tuxedo Jackets were a superb touch of class and glamour. Their responsiveness during wedding planning was also extraordinaire, a 10/10. Thank you for making a memorable wedding night!
(continue reading)
Junior is Amazing!!
Jackie Wells
Dear Junior,
A huge thank you for making our Fisher Island February wedding celebration absolutely incredible! Every single detail—from the musicians to the lighting, the LED walls, and the Yembe Drums performers—was beyond amazing. The girls in the peacock costumes were breathtaking, adding such a unique and elegant touch, and the DJ had the crowd jumping the entire night. The energy was unreal, and we had the best time ever!

I can’t tell you how much I appreciate all the effort, professionalism, and attention to detail you put into making everything run so seamlessly. You went above and beyond, and it truly showed. Every guest was raving about how amazing the entertainment was, and I’ll definitely be recommending you to all my friends for their events—no question about it!

Thank you again for everything. You were so good to us, and I couldn’t have asked for a better team to bring the night to life. Hope to work with you again soon!
(continue reading)
Best Decision Ever!
Sophia Alvarez
We were so impressed with the 9-piece Ice Breakers Band for our wedding at The Breakers - all of our guests had the best time on the dance floor and enjoyed all of the musicians! The vocalists were exceptional and the string quartet, as well as the violinists for our ceremony/cocktail portion of the evening were very elegant, perfectly set the ambiance for our very special celebration. My husband and I couldn't be happier with the entertainment chosen for our wedding - Junior was very professional and did a fantastic job!
WOW WOW WOW!
Ashley Roundtree
Why hire Junior’s?
1 – Junior’s Entertainment
is NOT an Agency
nor do they handle Club musicians and dancers but highly educated and trained talent and staff.
The Company produces and operates its own
Bands/Concepts
to please your music taste.
2 – Junior’s is an absolute investment
with 20+ years of Entertainment Experience customizing off-the charts events.
3 – Junior’s Team will guide you throughout the process from beginning to the successful end.
Your production manager will send you a customized Entertainment Itinerary (02) weeks prior to your event detailing all to be executed as planned with you and for you like no-other Company.
4 – The Company is a 100% winning choice
due to its intangible high value of knowing-how-to. This is an effect that you may not see now but will feel later – a product of more than 1000
Weddings
entertained locally, nationally, and globally.
5 – Junior’s Entertainment Group conducts their business practices ethically
and do not provide any commissions or kickbacks behind your knowledge to Event Planners or Venues.
The Company is fully insured
, and it will present their Certificate of Insurance upon request.
6 – Junior’s is one of the very few chosen as Exclusive Vendors of Entertainment
at
The
Breakers
and
Mar-a-lago
Palm Beach along 70 other amazing event venues throughout South Florida for all of the other
reasons mentioned above.
Please do not hesitate in
contacting Junior’s Team
to provide you availability, pricing, and guidance in developing a wow factor for your next event. They are available to travel Worldwide.
ASK NOW an
Instant Quote
to have them
assist you soon with the best of their experience and talent!
CUSTOMIZING SOPHISTICATED - FUN
WEDDINGS​

WHAT CLIENTS ARE SAYING!
Wow! Juniors Entertainment was the perfect fit for our 4/12/2025 wedding in Palm Beach, FL. From the ceremony with the Strings Ensembles and Singers, to the Jazz Band for the cocktail hour, and to The Ice Breakers Band for the Reception and DJ for the After-party - everything was perfect. My family and friends were amazed with all; the music Junior specially tailored for us. The Ceremony music was truly magical, and the Jazz vibe before the Reception set the pace for the party. The Ice Breakers had great enthusiasm and got the guests excited to dance on the dancefloor at all times. The Band Gowns and Tuxedo Jackets were a superb touch of class and glamour. Their responsiveness during wedding planning was also extraordinaire, a 10/10. Thank you for making a memorable wedding night!

Junior is Amazing!!
Jackie Wells
Dear Junior,
A huge thank you for making our Fisher Island February wedding celebration absolutely incredible! Every single detail—from the musicians to the lighting, the LED walls, and the Yembe Drums performers—was beyond amazing. The girls in the peacock costumes were breathtaking, adding such a unique and elegant touch, and the DJ had the crowd jumping the entire night. The energy was unreal, and we had the best time ever!

I can’t tell you how much I appreciate all the effort, professionalism, and attention to detail you put into making everything run so seamlessly. You went above and beyond, and it truly showed. Every guest was raving about how amazing the entertainment was, and I’ll definitely be recommending you to all my friends for their events—no question about it!

Thank you again for everything. You were so good to us, and I couldn’t have asked for a better team to bring the night to life. Hope to work with you again soon!
